src:
Hasil Pertandingan Atalanta vs Manchester City: Skor 1-1
07 Nov 2019, 05:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester City hanya mampu bermain imbang 1-1 ketika berhadapan dengan Atalanta dalam laga matchday keempat fase grup Liga Champions 2019-20 yang dihelat di Giuseppe Meazza, Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari WIB.
Manchester City unggul lebih dulu berkat gol yang dicetak Raheem Sterling. Namun Atalanta sukses membuat kedudukan kembali seimbang lewat gol Mario Pasalic.
Berkat hasil ini, Manchester City masih nyaman di puncak klasemen Grup C dengan poin 10, sedangkan Atalanta meraih poin pertamanya di Liga Champions.

Simak ulasan pertandingan selengkapnya di bawah ini.
text:
Atalanta vs Manchester City Results: Score 1-1
Nov 7, 2019, 05:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester City were only able to draw 1-1 when dealing with Atalanta in the fourth matchday match of the 2019-20 Champions League group stage held at Giuseppe Meazza on Thursday (11/07/2019) early morning hrs.
Manchester City took the lead thanks to goals from Raheem Sterling. But Atalanta successfully made the position back into balance through Mario Pasalic's goal.
Thanks to these results, Manchester City are still comfortable at the top of Group C with 10 points, while Atalanta won his first point in the Champions League.

Check out the full match review below.
